name: Head to Head - Friendly Feud
description:
Quiz your friends and show off your smarts in the hottest new trivia game! 1000s of easy and fun quizzes to elevate your brain and put your friends to the test.

Think you can handle an easy trivia quiz?
How many ice cream flavors can you name? What are the 7 continents?
Whoever has the most correct answers is the winner! Seems like an easy game right? Well not all the quizzes are that easy but being the trivia master you are, you’ll get to #1 on the leaderboard in no time.

Ready to elevate your brain with an easy trivia test? Get in the game and show us what you got!
